name: Pediatric Mets
title: Pediatric Mets
notes: **Note:** Involvement of inguinal, pelvic, or external iliac lymph nodes with previous scrotal or inguinal surgery prior to presentation of the testis tumor are coded in Pediatric Regional Nodes.
rows:
Distant lymph node(s)
* WITHOUT previous scrotal or inguinal surgery OR UNKNOWN if previous scrotal or inguinal surgery
   - External iliac
   - Inguinal, NOS
   - Deep, NOS
   - Node of Cloquet or Rosenmuller (highest deep inguinal)
   - Superficial (femoral)
  - Pelvic, NOS
* Retroperitoneal specified as above the diaphragm
* Distant lymph node(s), NOS

Lung

WITH or WITHOUT distant lymph nodes

Other specified distant metastasis
WITH or WITHOUT distant lymph node(s) and/or lung

Carcinomatosis

Unknown; distant metastasis not stated
Not documented in medical record

Death Certificate Only
